If you don't want to test it, I understand.=A0 This is only a suggestion fo=
r people who want to test it.=A0 An objective test, such as this, would be =
I think a good way to determine its accuracy.=A0 And its accuracy is what c=
arries over into its overall performance and value.=A0 If you have no measu=
rement as to the accuracy of its results, or of a given methodology, then t=
hat brings into questions its overall results, and so, its other answers.

=
Again, though, if you don't want to test it, I understand.
